data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Throw-in for Inter in the half of Napoli.
In the minute 2, Corner awarded to Inter.
Free kick for Napoli in their own half.
Davide Massa signals a free kick to Napoli in their own half.
In the minute 7, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Mario Rui for the away team is judged to be offside.
Davide Massa signals a Inter throw-in in Napoli's half.
In the minute 9, Davide Massa signals a free kick to Inter.
Napoli awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Inter in their own half.
In the minute 13, Dries Mertens is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Davide Massa awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Inter close to the penalty box.
In the minute 16, Gennaro Gattuso (Napoli) is making a first change, with Andrea Petagna replacing the possibly injured Dries Mertens.
Lautaro Martinez of Inter gets in a strike, but is off target.
Napoli have a goal kick.
In the minute 18, Throw-in for Napoli at Giuseppe Meazza.
Inter have been awarded a corner by Davide Massa.
Can Inter get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Napoli's half?
In the minute 24, Inter to take a throw-in in Napoli territory.
Important block from the Inter defence as Andrea Petagna fires in a strike for Napoli.
Corner awarded to Napoli.
In the minute 29, Davide Massa signals a free kick to Inter in their own half.
Goal kick for Napoli at Giuseppe Meazza.
Davide Massa waits before resuming play because Nicolo Barella for Inter is still down.
In the minute 30, Piotr Zielinski is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Interâ€™s Nicolo Barella is on his feet again at Giuseppe Meazza.
Napoli's Piotr Zielinski is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 32, Inter have a dangerous throw-in.
Napoli push forward at Giuseppe Meazza and Hirving Lozano gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Inter defence.
In Milan Napoli attack through Piotr Zielinski. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 34, It's a goal kick for the home team in Milan.
Inter drive forward but Romelu Lukaku is judged offside.
Napoli's Lorenzo Insigne gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 37, Davide Massa awards Inter a goal kick.
Can Inter capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Napoli's half?
Davide Massa blows against Napoli's Andrea Petagna for offside.
In the minute 38, Roberto Gagliardini (Inter) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Napoli defenders.
Napoli's Piotr Zielinski gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Inter defender.
In Milan, Lorenzo Insigne of Napoli is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 41, Napoli have been awarded a corner by Davide Massa.
Ball goes out of play for a Inter goal kick.
Throw-in high up the field for Inter in Milan.
In the minute 43, Ball safe as Napoli is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Napoli.
Free kick for Napoli in their own half.
In the minute 45, The fourth official's board shows 2 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Inter have been awarded a corner by Davide Massa.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Napoli awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Napoli awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 48, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick Napoli.
Free kick for Napoli in the half of Inter.
In the minute 54, Lorenzo Insigne for Napoli gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Inter goal kick.
In Milan a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 57, Marcelo Brozovic (Inter) gets a yellow card.
Inter needs to be cautious. Napoli have an attacking throw-in.
Davide Massa signals a throw-in for Napoli, close to Inter's area.
In the minute 59, Davide Massa signals a free kick to Inter in their own half.
Tiemoue Bakayoko is booked for the away team.
Davide Massa awards Napoli a goal kick.
In the minute 61, Throw-in for Inter at Giuseppe Meazza.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Milan to check on Marcelo Brozovic, who is grimacing with pain.
Marcelo Brozovic is back on the pitch.
In the minute 63, Napoli's Hirving Lozano is whistled for offside at Giuseppe Meazza.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Napoli close to the penalty box.
Can Inter capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Napoli's half?
In the minute 66, Inter to take a throw-in in Napoli territory.
Ball safe as Napoli is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Antonio Conte (Inter) has taken off Marcelo Brozovic who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Stefano Sensi is the replacement.
In the minute 68, Free kick for Napoli in their own half.
Lorenzo Insigne gets his shot on target but fails to score for Napoli.
Throw-in high up the field for Napoli in Milan.
In the minute 69, Davide Massa signals a throw-in for Napoli, close to Inter's area.
An attacking Inter player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
In the minute 70, In Milan Napoli's Mario Rui is caught offside.
David Ospina (Napoli) has received a first yellow card.
Lorenzo Insigne Napoli.
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead thanks to a penalty from Romelu Lukaku.
Davide Massa signals a free kick to Inter.
In the minute 74, Gennaro Gattuso (Napoli) is making a second substitution, with Fabian Ruiz replacing Piotr Zielinski.
Matteo Politano is replacing Tiemoue Bakayoko for Napoli at Giuseppe Meazza.
In the minute 74, Hirving Lozano (Napoli) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Goal kick for Napoli at Giuseppe Meazza.
In Milan a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 77, Antonio Conte is making the team's second substitution at Giuseppe Meazza with Achraf Hakimi replacing Lautaro Martinez.
Free kick for Inter in the half of Napoli.
Corner awarded to Inter.
In the minute 80, Napoli awarded a free kick in their own half.
Napoli's Matteo Politano gets in a shot on goal at Giuseppe Meazza. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 80, Inter will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Napoli.
Romelu Lukaku (Inter) has received a yellow card from Davide Massa.
Throw-in for Inter in the half of Napoli.
Davide Massa awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 82, Free kick for Napoli in their own half.
Throw-in for Napoli close to the penalty box.
Napoli drive upfield and Matteo Politano gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Inter defender.
In the minute 84, Napoli's Giovanni Di Lorenzo misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Milan.
Free kick Napoli.
Faouzi Ghoulam is replacing Mario Rui for the away team.
In the minute 85, The away team have replaced Diego Demme with Eljif Elmas. This is the fifth substitution made today by Gennaro Gattuso.
At Giuseppe Meazza, Milan Skriniar has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 86, Napoli's Matteo Politano gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Inter defender.
The home team have replaced Ashley Young with Danilo D`Ambrosio. This is the third substitution made today by Antonio Conte.
Corner awarded to Napoli.
In the minute 87, Inter awarded a free kick in their own half.
Davide Massa signals a free kick to Napoli in their own half.
In the minute 88, In Milan a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Danilo D`Ambrosio is booked for the home team.
Davide Massa signals a Napoli throw-in in Inter's half.
In Milan Napoli drive forward through Giovanni Di Lorenzo. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Davide Massa signals a free kick to Inter in their own half.
Achraf Hakimi (Inter) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 4 minutes of added time.
Napoli's Andrea Petagna fires in a great shot but is denied by the woodwork.
Inter have a goal kick.
Can Inter get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Napoli's half?
Inter awarded a free kick in their own half.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-0.
Samir Handanovic (Inter) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
